TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 扩展 Web 服务器控件的设计时行为。

span.span: Extends design-time behavior for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 此节包含两个代码示例。The section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何从派生类类。The first code example demonstrates how to derive a class from the class. 第二个代码示例演示如何显示`StyledTable`类在设计时。The second code example demonstrates how to display the `StyledTable` class at design time. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个名为的设计器类`StyledTableDesigner`，该类派生自类，并用于在从派生的类的设计时显示两个单元格类。The following code example demonstrates how to create a designer class named `StyledTableDesigner`, which is derived from the class, and is used to display two cells at design time for a class that is derived from the class. [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner/VB/customtabledesigner.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用`DesignerAttribute`关联`StyledTableDesigner`类，该类具有`StyledTable`类，以便它可以在设计时显示。The following code example uses the `DesignerAttribute` to associate the `StyledTableDesigner` class with the `StyledTable` class so that it can be displayed at design time. [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner/VB/customtable.vb#3)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时表示控件的 HTML。

span.span: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: 用于在设计时表示控件的 HTML。

span.span: The HTML used to represent the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可确保该表具有至少一个行和单元格并单元包含用于在设计时显示的一些文本。The method ensures that the table has at least one row and cell and that the cells contain some text for display at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以显示行和单元格的`StyledTable`设计图面上的类。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to display rows and cells for the `StyledTable` class on the design surface. 在`Try`阻止，代码将检查是否表包含任何行或单元格，，如果不是，请创建一个行，并执行一次循环来创建两个单元格的行，以及要在设计时显示在每个单元的占位符文本。In the `Try` block, the code checks whether the table contains any rows or cells, and if it does not, creates a row and performs a loop to create two cells for the row, along with placeholder text to display in each cell at design time. 如果表不为空，但某行为，该代码执行同样的循环，以创建并填充单元格。If the table is not empty, but a row is, the code performs the same loop to create and populate the cells. 在`Finally`块中，代码返回到其原始状态的值。In the `Finally` block, the code returns the values to their original state. [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner/VB/customtabledesigner.vb#2)]
